subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The German club played to a 0-0 tie with Shakhtar Donetsk in a game that saw plenty of yellow cards and Bayern’s Xabi Alonso being sent off.
snippet: The German club played to a 0-0 tie with Shakhtar Donetsk in a game that saw plenty of yellow cards and Bayern’s Xabi Alonso being sent off.
